name: Dot's Detonator Dungeon
description:
Open 32 of the chests and you win. There's 40 to choose from. How hard could it be?

A fan game for https://www.twitch.tv/team/popnstart team starring Dot_Lvl, and featuring other friends of the channel.

Known bugs: manually entering seed numbers aren't being read the same way as seeds that are auto loaded. (possibly fixed, still testing)

Ver. 1.05 hitstun glitch patched. Deathspin glitch patched.

Ver.1.044 Boss room glitch patched
